author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...PRISCILLA BRINGING HIGH SURF CONDITIONS TO PORTIONS OF THE PACIFIC COAST OF MEXICO...
summary: ...PRISCILLA BRINGING HIGH SURF CONDITIONS TO PORTIONS OF THE PACIFIC COAST OF MEXICO... As of 5:00 AM MST Wed Oct 08 the center of Priscilla was located near 21.1, -112.2 with movement NW at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 979 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...PRISCILLA BRINGING HIGH SURF CONDITIONS TO PORTIONS OF THE PACIFIC COAST OF MEXICO... As of 5:00 AM MST Wed Oct 08 the center of Priscilla was located near 21.1, -112.2 with movement NW at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 979 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Priscilla (EP1/EP162025)
